text: What's the cleanest way to redirect somebody to a particular thank you page based on a form selection (for example a checkbox or a select field)?
Is there an Inbound event channel?

Yeah that's what I've done in the past... There's that little form success function you can wait for and then just run a JS redirect based on the form value... Just didn't know if there was an even simpler way. Thanks Chad. How have you been. btw?

Hey all, thanks to the awesome comment above by <@UDHT6N5SM>, we’ve spun up an <#C01BBPNJ25A|inbound-conference> channel for all conversations related to the INBOUND conference event. Feel free to hop in and discuss all things INBOUND!

Hi all, anyone knows how to change (or add) to a CRM account the developers services? into my company the beginning using HubSpot CRM but now we need the developers “tabs” but the system only shows to us the possibility to create a new account. I program a meeting with a HubSpot specialist, but he never connect to the zoom link that he send. If someone can help me i will appreciate a lot!
<@U017458R1MH>, can you confirm that I need a paid license with OneTrust? No alternative?

Is the HubSpot <https://community.HubSpot.com/|marketing forum> built custom? I'm looking to create a community forum on my site. Is this doable through any 3rd party apps? Does anyone have any examples/experience with this?

Specifically looking to give registered users the ability to create a post, start a thread etc...

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Knowledge-Base-Tool/bd-p/service_knowledge>
I am not aware of alternatives. CookiePro is quite affordable.
